Projects

~ Check my github to see my full list of projects

  • Waterfall.js

    Currently the best option today to do the pinterest grid effect is Masonry, but it's very heavy and have dependency of jQuery. Please understand: this isn't a problem is most cases, but in cases when perfomance and page weight matters, the best case is try other options: maybe pure CSS? It's possible?

    This question have a good point. Yes, exists CSS ways to solve, using flexbox or columns technic, but doesn't work well when you don't know about your data/structure. So we have to use JavaScript. The challenge is create a decent algorithm where no matter the structure: Waterfall will work.

    However; Waterfall always will consider items with same width :)

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • Inphinity

    A infinity scroll without jQuery or other dependency

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • Calendario

    Node module to check if a day is a workday or holiday

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • native-css

    Convert pure CSS to javascript literal objects or React Style

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • Ranza

    The dependency checker

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • Kenobi

    Render objects for view engines or static html

    See in npmjs or fork in GitHub

  • Shot Hunt

    A gallery for the best screenshots of Product Hunt.

    See project

  • Periodic table for windows phone

    Application that allows the user to have on your Windows Phone, the periodic table with all the elements and their annually updated information. Only available in brazilian portuguese.

    Download for Windows Phone

  • Sound Hunter

    It's an experiment for the Chrome browser for while, allows the user to quickly find songs. Use YouTube API and some Web's API (mic and full screen).

    See this or fork in GitHub

  • treeData.js

    JavaScript plugin to easy create an tree data structure.

    See this or fork in GitHub
